thread.title: Coleman 3 TD catches for No. 2 Baylor in 62-38 win over WVU
thread.title_full: Coleman 3 TD catches for No. 2 Baylor in 62-38 win over WVU

author: STEPHEN HAWKINS
title: Coleman 3 TD catches for No. 2 Baylor in 62-38 win over WVU
text:
Sports Coleman 3 TD catches for No. 2 Baylor in 62-38 win over WVU Baylor wide receiver Corey Coleman (1) pulls in a Seth Russell pass to score against West Virginia in the first half of an NCAA college football game, Saturday, Oct 17, 2015, in Waco, Texas. (AP Photo/Rod Aydelotte) more > By STEPHEN HAWKINS   
WACO, Texas (AP) - Corey Coleman caught three more touchdowns and second-ranked Baylor won its FBS-best 19th consecutive home game, getting some measure of revenge with a 62-38 victory over West Virginia on Saturday. 
Coleman matched and then broke the single-season school record for TD catches, his nation-leading 16 coming halfway through the regular season for the Bears (6-0, 3-0 Big 12). 
Seth Russell became the only Baylor quarterback other than Heisman Trophy winner Robert Griffin III in 2011 to throw for 300 yards and run for 100 yards in the same game. Russell had five TD passes and ran 14 times for 160 yards with another score. 
Baylor’s only regular-season loss last year was 41-27 at West Virginia, and the Bears wound up the first team left out of the initial College Football Playoff. 
Skyler Howard, from Fort Worth, Texas, less than 100 miles from the Baylor campus, threw four TD passes for West Virginia (3-3, 0-3). 
___
